narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 6-year-old female was last seen at Arlington at 2025-10-03T21:57:17.899387+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to meet a friend.
behavioral_patterns: left on foot toward nearby woods
narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 12 hours of disappearance, movement cues left on foot toward nearby woods suggest travel west toward Blue Ridge along I-64. A white 2016 Jeep Grand Cherokee was observed departing near Arlington, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 23 hours later, a passerby reported someone matching the description (6-year-old female, wearing blue windbreaker, black leggings, black boots) near Essex.
witness_accounts.clothing: blue windbreaker, black leggings, black boots
witness_accounts.behavior: asking the child questions and offering a ride

news.title: Missing female child reported in Arlington

persons_of_interest.note: switching vehicles after leaving the scene

provenance._fulltext: A 6-year-old female was last seen at Arlington at 2025-10-03T21:57:17.899387+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to meet a friend. Within 12 hours of disappearance, movement cues left on foot toward nearby woods suggest travel west toward Blue Ridge along I-64. A white 2016 Jeep Grand Cherokee was observed departing near Arlington, Virginia. Around 23 hours later, a passerby reported someone matching the description (6-year-old female, wearing blue windbreaker, black leggings, black boots) near Essex.
